chart.description: Overall disk usage at hypservisor in GB
chart.name: Disk Usage
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.openstack.nova.hypervisor.local_gb').mean(by=['hypervisor_hostname']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
C = data('gauge.openstack.nova.hypervisor.free_disk_gb').mean(by=['hypervisor_hostname']).publish(label='C')
D = data('gauge.openstack.nova.hypervisor.disk_available_least').mean(by=['hypervisor_hostname']).publish(label='D', enable=False)
B = data('gauge.openstack.nova.hypervisor.local_gb_used').mean(by=['hypervisor_hostname']).publish(label='B')
E = (C-D+B).publish(label='E')
